requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description: Allow users to create a new account in the system.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to create a new account in the system.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Register an account

System Behavior: The system accepts user registration details and creates a new account.

Expected Outcome: A new user account is created successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message indicating successful registration.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides valid registration details
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the registration form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system creates a new user account and displays a confirmation message.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description: Allow users to log in to their accounts.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to log in to their accounts.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Log in to the account

System Behavior: The system verifies user credentials and grants access.

Expected Outcome: User is logged in successfully.

Observable Result: The user is redirected to their dashboard after successful login.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides valid login credentials
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the login form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system logs the user in and redirects them to their dashboard.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Password Reset
requirements.description: Allow users to reset their password if forgotten.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to reset their password if forgotten.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Password Reset
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Reset password

System Behavior: The system sends a password reset link to the user's registered email.

Expected Outcome: User receives a password reset email.

Observable Result: The user receives an email with a link to reset their password.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user requests a password reset
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits their email address
acceptance_criteria.then: The system sends a password reset link to the provided email address.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Profile Update
requirements.description: Allow users to update their profile information.

acceptance_criteria.then: Allow users to update their profile information.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

requirements.title: Update Profile
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Update profile information

System Behavior: The system accepts changes to the user's profile and saves them.

Expected Outcome: User's profile information is updated successfully.

Observable Result: The user receives a confirmation message indicating successful profile update.

acceptance_criteria.given: A user provides valid profile update information
acceptance_criteria.when: The user submits the profile update form
acceptance_criteria.then: The system updates the user's profile and displays a confirmation message.

requirements.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

package.original_input: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

interpretation_notes: The input contains multiple actions that need to be decomposed into individual requirements.
Each action represents a distinct functionality that can be tested independently.

overview.original_intent: Users can register, log in, reset their password, and update their profile.

capabilities.title: User Registration
capabilities.summary: Allow users to create a new account in the system.

acceptance_criteria.text: Given a user provides valid registration details, when the user submits registration form, then The system creates a new user account and displays a confirmation message.

capabilities.title: User Login
capabilities.summary: Allow users to log in to their accounts.

acceptance_criteria.text: Given a user provides valid login credentials, when the user submits login form, then The system logs the user in and redirects them to their dashboard.

capabilities.title: Password Reset
capabilities.summary: Allow users to reset their password if forgotten.

acceptance_criteria.text: Given a user requests a password reset, when the user submitsir email address, then The system sends a password reset link to the provided email address.

capabilities.title: Profile Update
capabilities.summary: Allow users to update their profile information.

acceptance_criteria.text: Given a user provides valid profile update information, when the user submits profile update form, then The system updates the user's profile and displays a confirmation message.
